start: To start, please provide your credentials in this format: /start [apikey] [secretkey] [login] [password] - Get API key and secret key from Freedom24 Auth API - Use your regular Freedom24 login and password (we will calculate and store the SID for you) Note: your credentials will be stored in the database. Do not enable "Allow trading and submission of orders" for security reasons
created: Credentials saved. Hit /start again to change them anytime. See /portfolio to see your portfolio

subscribe.usage: Please provide a ticker to subscribe to: /subscribe AAPL
